org.jruby.util.encoding

Class CharsetTranscoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jruby.util.encoding.Transcoder
      • org.jruby.util.encoding.CharsetTranscoder

  • public class CharsetTranscoder
extends Transcoder
    Encapsulate all logic associated with using Java Charset transcoding facilities.

      • transcode

        public static org.jruby.util.ByteList transcode(ThreadContext context,
                                org.jruby.util.ByteList value,
                                org.jcodings.Encoding fromEncoding,
                                org.jcodings.Encoding toEncoding,
                                IRubyObject opts)
        This will try and transcode the supplied ByteList to the supplied toEncoding. It will use forceEncoding as its encoding if it is supplied; otherwise it will use the encoding it has tucked away in the bytelist. This will return a new copy of a ByteList in the request encoding or die trying (ConverterNotFound). c: rb_str_conv_enc_opts
